doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Ian McQue
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Retro by Ian McQue

main.head: Retro
main.p: Ian McQue works in videogame development at Rockstar North as assistant art director and concept artist. He has been part of the teams behind the acclaimed Grand Theft Auto series, Manhunt, Bully, and more. His personal work has been published widely, from Imagine FX magazine to books from Design Studio Press. In conjunction with Industria Mechanika he also designs model kits.
